title: Pregnant Chloe Lewis' parents' pub 'decorated with blue balloons'

Chloe Lewis, 28, is set to give birth any day and the former TOWIE beauty has kept quiet on some of the details.

It has been revealed exclusively to Mirror Online that the former reality TV star's parents' pub - The Top Oak in Stapleford Abbotts in Essex - was decorated with blue foil balloons on Thursday morning which were later taken down.

The source told The Mirror: "This morning someone had put blue star and heart balloons all outside Chloe's parents' pub - so I think she has given birth to a boy.

"They were tied along the fence on the main road."

The onlooker added: "Later that day all the balloons had been taken down!

"It made me think because there were balloons there when her sister had a baby boy."

(Image: Instagram)

Mirror Online have reached out to Chloe's representative for comment.

On Monday, the Essex star told her one million Instagram fans that she was still pregnant after passing her due date which was over a week ago.

She gave the update by sharing a text image on her story which read: "Update: Still pregnant."

It comes after Chloe shared a snap on Instagram with her beau Danny Flasher.

The beauty penned under the loved-up snap: "Still can’t believe we have made a little human... so grateful for you & everything you have brought to my life. Thought I’d let you know before my new favourite person comes into the world."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Chloe announced she was expecting her first tot in May

She told of the happy news by sharing a sweet black and white picture of her ultrasound, alongside a snap of Danny kissing her cheek.

"Half me, half you," she said.

The TV star shared her baby news just weeks after insisting kids were definitely on the cards for her and Danny.

When quizzed about marriage and children, Chloe told the Daily Mail : "You have to ask [Danny] that! I hope so, I’ve always wanted babies and marriage, so I’m sure it’ll be in the near future.

"Being an auntie for now is amazing, it’s the best thing. I’m only an aunt and I feel like I’m a mum sometimes. You can give them back, that’s the good thing!"

(Image: Instagram)

Chloe and Essex banker Danny have been in a relationship for two years.

The brunette rose to fame on ITVBe's The Only Way Is Essex in 2015 and since leaving the series she has modelled for online retailer Boohoo and launched her own make-up line.
